email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can understand your position. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Please confirm the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Once confirmed, we can proceed with the fixture. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thank you for your confirmation. Yes, the laycan is firm at 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll prepare the fixture recap and send it over for your review. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Please send over the fixture recap, and we’ll review it promptly. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find attached the fixture recap for your review. Let me know if any changes are needed. Once confirmed, we can proceed with the formal agreement. Best, Sarah
